comment: A timeless classic with deep characters and beautiful prose.

Powerful themes of justice and morality. A must-read.
Relatable yet frustrating protagonist. A unique read.
Charming and witty. A delightful romantic classic.

Challenging concepts and a futuristic vision. Very relevant.
